access_key.Description:
The access key for API operations. You can retrieve this
from the 'My Credential' section of the console.

cert.Description: A client certificate to authenticate with.

domain_id.Description: The ID of the Domain to scope to (Identity v3).

domain_name.Description: The name of the Domain to scope to (Identity v3).

key.Description: A client private key to authenticate with.

region.Description: The HuaweiCloudStack region to connect to.

secret_key.Description:
The secret key for API operations. You can retrieve this
from the 'My Credential' section of the console.

tenant_id.Description:
The ID of the Tenant (Identity v2) or Project (Identity v3)
to login with.

tenant_name.Description:
The name of the Tenant (Identity v2) or Project (Identity v3)
to login with.

token.Description: Authentication token to use as an alternative to username/password.

delete_instances.Description: Whether to delete instances when they are removed from the AS group.

health_periodic_audit_time.Description: The health check period for instances, in minutes.

instances.Description: The instances id list in the as group.

lb_listener_id.Description: The system supports the binding of up to three ELB listeners, the IDs of which are separated using a comma.

tenant_id.Description:
The ID of the Tenant (Identity v2) or Project (Identity v3)
to login with.

The ID of the Tenant (Identity v2) or Project (Identity v3)
to login with.
